name: James H. Martin
content: James H. Martin ECES 126 Engineering Center University of Colorado Boulder, Colorado 80309-00430 My research addresses natural language processing (NLP) with a focus on computational semantics and its application to problems in healthcare and education. I am the co-author with Dan Jurafsky of a popular textbook on NLP: Speech and Language Processing: An Introduction to Natural Language Processing, Computational Linguistics and Speech Recognition, currently being revised for a 3rd edition. Email is the best way to reach me. Note that I am not currently recruiting new PhD students.
